showWelcome.description: Whether to show the welcome info on launch. Explains how to setup the program etc.

autoStart.description: Whether to start the app on login automatically. Note: starts hidden.

timeoutSecs.description: Max time a command can take in seconds. By default 300 (= 5 mins).

defaultCommand.description: Defaults to whichever has hotkey number 1 (or if not hotkeys, the first one it finds)

hideOnLostFocus.description: Whether clicking outside the command bar will cause it to hide.

keepOnTop.description: Keep on top of other windows?
